response: You can book a car by visiting our 'Cars' page and selecting a vehicle. Let me know if you need help!
To cancel or modify your booking, visit 'My Bookings' and select the appropriate option.
To rent a car, you need a valid driver's license and an identity proof.
We accept credit/debit cards and online payments through our secure gateway.
You can check car availability on our 'Cars' page with filters for different car types.
You can contact our support team at support@carrentalsystem.com or call +123456789.
Our rental service is available from 9 AM to 9 PM every day.
We offer seasonal discounts. Check our 'Offers' section for current promotions!
Fuel policy depends on the rental agreement. Please check our terms for details.
Any damages will be assessed upon return. Additional charges may apply as per our policy.
